Major_Arcs.title: Woman in Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the woman's arrival and confusion in Ghost Town, her attempts to explain her situation, and the initial conflict regarding the airport plan.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Explanation
sub_scenes.description: The woman arrives in Ghost Town and desperately tries to explain her unbelievable situation to various men, highlighting her urgency and frustration.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Explanations in Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Airport Threat
sub_scenes.description: The woman overhears plans to build an airport in Ghost Town, leading to her horrified confrontation with the men involved.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Airport Plans and Confrontation in Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Tensions and Real Offer
sub_scenes.description: The narrative shifts to the woman's interaction with Cal, discussing their relationship and a 'real offer' in the blasted desert, leading to a new location and potential danger.

narrative_arcs.title: The Real Offer in the Blasted Desert
Arrival at the Work Site and Confrontation with Workers

Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Relationship and Business Dealings
Major_Arcs.description: Focuses on the evolving relationship between Nan and Cal, their family conflicts, and the practicalities of horse business and the airport development.

sub_scenes.title: Horse Business and Family Conflict
sub_scenes.description: The narrative shifts to Nan and her family, discussing horse transportation for the airport and family tensions arising from Nan's 'crazy notions' and relationship with Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Helping Construction Workers and Crazy Notions
Solace in Tears and Maid's Comfort

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Clarification and Business Urgency
sub_scenes.description: Nan seeks relationship advice and confronts Cal, leading to a chase and a return to the pressing business of horses and the airport deadline.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother's Advice on Love and Patience
Maid's Practical Advice and Cal's Love
Desperate Chase and Plea for Attention
Yore Dad's Deal and No Backing Down

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confession and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal discuss their relationship intertwined with business practicalities, leading to a moment of separation and Cal's subsequent confession of his feelings.

Major_Arcs.title: The Snowstorm and Operation Hay Lift
Major_Arcs.description: Deals with the severe snowstorm, its impact on the community, and the hope brought by the airlift operation, culminating in community relief and romantic reflection.

sub_scenes.title: Love and Impending Weather Crisis
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal's affection is juxtaposed with the arrival of grim weather news, foreshadowing a community crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Hope and Community Relief
sub_scenes.description: Despair turns to hope with the arrival of the 'Operation Hay Lift', bringing community relief and a moment of romantic reflection for Nan and Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of Hope: Arrival of the Plane

Major_Arcs.title: The Ballad of Chane Benson
Major_Arcs.description: Introduces Chane Benson and his conflict, exploring different perspectives on his character and culminating in a violent confrontation and resolution, revealing deeper societal judgments and moral complexities.

sub_scenes.title: Public Perception of Chane Benson
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson's forceful nature is introduced, contrasted with varied public opinions ranging from intrigue to critical judgment.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Critical Opinion of Chane Benson
Sally and Older Man's More Mature Perspective on Chane Benson

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Conflict and Dinner with Benson
sub_scenes.description: Jeff's admiration of violent figures and subsequent escalating argument with Sally, leading to an uneasy dinner invitation for Benson aimed at reconciliation.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Past Hero Worship and Questioning Gun Handling
Reassurance and Commitment to Change Jeff
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Storytelling
Confrontation and Denial about the Article
Benson's Declaration to Stay and Fight Killers
Clyde's Defiant Articles and Public Reaction
End of Dinner and Moonlight Charm
Resolution of the Standoff and Benson's Departure
Reflecting on Tension and Expressing Remorse
Headline Change, Relief, and Newspaper Work

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve in the Range War
Major_Arcs.description: Focuses on Betsy and Steve's evolving relationship within the context of a range war, their choices between love and violence, and the dramatic confrontations arising from the land conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Rising Tension
sub_scenes.description: Introduces Betsy and Steve, setting up Steve's role as bodyguard amidst the brewing range war and escalating tensions.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley as Bodyguard
Discussion of Range War and Underlying Troubles

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Fight
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve face direct antagonism in town, leading to a physical altercation and observations of Steve's deadly skills.

narrative_arcs.title: Departure from the Store and Daley's Observation
Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Hired Hand
Observations on Steve's Skills and Impending Danger

sub_scenes.title: Love and Principles Clash
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve grapple with their feelings amid the range war, facing a choice between love and principles regarding violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Maverick's Observation and Question to Betsy
Hank Defends Steve and Maverick's Suggestion
Steve's Dilemma and Betsy's Confession of Love
Steve's Ultimate Proof of Love and Betsy's Acceptance

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Showdown and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The range war escalates to a violent confrontation at Devil's Pass, testing Betsy and Steve's resolve and leading to a dramatic climax and uncertain resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Bridges Confronts Hank and Accuses Trespassing
Betsy and Steve Prepare for Confrontation
Betsy Justifies Gun Violence as Necessary
Betsy Recounts the Ambush and Loss of Horses
Aftermath of the Ambush and Hank's Escape
Ride to Devil's Pass and Gunfire Encounter
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Warning

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie and Fred's Tumultuous Romance
Major_Arcs.description: Centers on Carrie and Fred's complicated relationship, marked by initial conflict, attraction, deception, and eventual reconciliation leading to a marriage proposal.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Conflict and Initial Encounters
sub_scenes.description: Introduces Carrie and Dave and a new ranch conflict, setting the stage for Carrie and Fred's initial interactions and misunderstandings.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern over Curley and Bear Fenin's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Past Guilt and Unexpected Romance
sub_scenes.description: Carrie and Dave reflect on past events, leading to an unexpected encounter with Fred and the blossoming of a complicated romance.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Past Apologies and Lingering Resentment
Carrie's Reluctance to Discuss Fred and Preference for Dave
Initial Confrontation and Demand to Leave Dave Alone
Reflection on Love and a Marriage Proposal

sub_scenes.title: Deception, Confrontation, and Reconciliation
sub_scenes.description: Carrie discovers Fred's deception regarding the beef contract, leading to a confrontation, emotional fallout, and eventual reconciliation and proposal acceptance.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Deception and Contract Motive
Night of Reflection and Business Meeting
Carrie's Shame, Regret, and Joyful Ride

Major_Arcs.title: Chris and Rance's Love Story Amidst Law and Duty
Major_Arcs.description: Explores the relationship between Chris and Rance, their conflict arising from duty and law, and eventual resolution through love and understanding, culminating in a wedding disrupted by past conflicts but ultimately resolved.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Injury and the Marshal's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Dirk arrives injured at Chris's, prompting medical attention and the arrival of Marshal Rance Cready investigating Dirk.

narrative_arcs.title: Past Encounter - Dirk and Chris Meet
Concern for Dirk and Investigation Plan
Sheriff Arrives and Identifies Chris & Dirk's Trail

sub_scenes.title: Arrest, Plea, and Confession
sub_scenes.description: Marshal Cready confronts Chris about Dirk, leading to Dirk's arrest, Chris's plea for leniency, and a surprising confession of love.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Delay and Conditional Stay

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit, Escape, and Return
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's escape and pursuit are depicted, leading to a violent confrontation where Chris is injured, and Dirk escapes to Mexico, only for Chris to decide to return to Rance.

narrative_arcs.title: Fleeing the Scene and Bandaging Wounds
Escape to Mexico and Criminal Escape
Return to Rance and Confession of Love
Concern for Rance and Separate Paths
Arrival in Mexico and Uncertain Reunion

sub_scenes.title: Recovery, Confession, and Wedding Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Rance recovers, Chris confesses her love, and they reconcile, leading to a wedding disrupted by Dirk's return but resolved with understanding and acceptance.

narrative_arcs.title: Inquiry About Business and Father's Opinion
Vows and Fears Before the Wedding
Backstory of the Man and Rance's Support
